column2: I think you can tell me about what's happening around the planet.
What else? We are completely blocked from going to space: they intercept everything, check it, and send it back. Who are they? What the hell?
They're Borks. Most of them are very aggressive and not very smart.
What do they want from us, then?
They want to rob Klisk ships, but the main trading spots are already taken. So they came here.
Why the hell knows? They probably want to rob. I should contact them and find out.
And it doesn't bother them that those Klisks, whoever they are, don't trade with us at all yet?
I told you: the Borks aren't very smart.
Well, it's not my place to tell you how to deal with this. They just have to go.
However you want them. But keep in mind that a full-scale fire show on Earth's orbit will cause panic on the planet. Do we really need that?
I'll try to avoid doing that, but I can't promise you anything. All right, I have to go.
